title: The "Mayuri Manoranjani" Polki Diamond Haaram with Ruby and Emerald Accents
materials: Natural Pearls (ముత్యాలు). Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This magnificent Haaram showcases the timeless elegance of South Indian jewelry. It features intricate floral and peacock (Mayuri) motifs crafted with meticulously set Polki diamonds. A central cabochon ruby is surrounded by concentric circles of emeralds and diamond, creating a focal point of captivating color. Delicate pearl and emerald drops add graceful movement. The use of uncut Polki diamonds adds to the vintage charm and regal appeal. Handmade by skilled artisans using traditional nakshi work techniques.
colors: Predominantly gold with the warm red of the ruby
the lush green of the emeralds
the milky white of the pearls
and the subtle sparkle of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for making a statement at high-end social gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, combining traditional design with exceptional gemstone quality. The use of Polki diamonds adds a unique antique charm, while the ruby and emerald accents symbolize prosperity and good fortune. The intricate detailing and Hyderabadi polish make it a valuable heirloom piece. It's a statement of cultural pride and timeless elegance.
